translation.en: I'm Lieutenant Dalton. I'm Lieutenant Dalton.
Lieutenant Dalton.
-[man] Herr Werner? -Yes.
I'm Lieutenant Dalton, up from Viden.
translation.es: Soy el teniente Dalton de Weiden.

translation.en: We've found a few inconsistencies in our records from your time with us
translation.es: Encontramos algunas incongruencias en nuestros registros.

translation.en: and we'd appreciate your help clarifying them.
-Thank you so much. -[Werner] Mm-hmm.
Please.
[woman] What do you want from us?
-It's all right. -He didn't do anything to you. He was a medic.
translation.es: - Tranquila. - Él no les hizo nada. Era médico.

translation.en: I don't know what stories he's been telling you, but we know who he is, Vera.
translation.es: No sé qué historia le contó a usted, pero sabemos quién es, Vera.

translation.en: My name is Annie.
No, your sons Klaus and the other boy, Dieter, they...
translation.es: No, su hijo se llama Klaus y el otro, Dieter. Ellos...

translation.en: -[Annie screams] -Shit! Shit! Moshe!
[Dalton] It's the wrong guy. It's not even him!
[Moshe] So, what?
He was a Nazi.
I bet he was on someone's list.
[Moshe] You gonna give us a hand or what? Come on.
[man 2] I remember reading years ago
translation.es: Recuerdo haber leído hace unos años

translation.en: some Austrian they mistook for me.
translation.es: sobre un austríaco a quien confundieron conmigo.

translation.en: I have the article framed at home.
translation.es: Tengo el artículo enmarcado en casa.

translation.en: I hope that future historians
will not be tempted to stray from the truth as we record it here today.
translation.es: no se vean tentados de alejarse de la verdad que grabaremos hoy.

translation.en: I could talk of what I saw
translation.es: Podría hablar de lo que vi

translation.en: at the pits, in Minsk.
Or the vans at Chelmno,
but these were the deeds and demands of others.
translation.es: pero esas fueron las acciones y las órdenes de otros.

translation.en: I issued no such orders.
Our work was paperwork,
our war a numerical one.
And though I struggled against endless idiocy,
translation.es: Y si bien luché contra una idiotez incesante...

translation.en: I only did what little I could in Germany's fight against her enemies.
translation.es: ...hice lo poco que pude en la lucha de Alemania contra sus enemigos.

translation.en: [woman] You said you wanted to take a job in Jersey.
translation.es: Dijiste que querías aceptar un trabajo en Jersey.

translation.en: Couldn't we run away? I'd do anything to be with you. Anything!
translation.es: ¿No podemos escapar? Haría lo que fuera para estar contigo, lo que fuera.

translation.en: That's not a bad idea.
That's not a bad idea at all.
-Just tell me one thing. -Yes.
Is it true?
Is what true?
Is your mother a nigger?
[man] Tell me.
-[man shouting] Tell me! -[woman] What difference does it make?
-You love me. -All the kids talking behind my back.
translation.es: - Tú me amas. - ¡Todos hablan a mis espaldas!

translation.en: -[man] Is it true? Are you black? -[woman] No! [woman] No, I'm as white as you.
translation.es: - ¿Es cierto? ¿Eres negra? - No. Soy tan blanca como tú.

translation.en: -[man] You're lying. -[woman] I'm not!
-[man] You're lying. You are! -[woman] I'm not! I'm not!
-[shushes] -[scoffs and chuckles]
-[man] So, you're German too? -[woman] Well, my father is.
translation.es: - Así que también eres alemana. - Mi padre lo es.

translation.en: I'd love to meet him sometime. Can I see you again?
translation.es: Me gustaría conocerlo algún día. ¿Puedo volver a verte?

translation.en: Father made us learn 100 Spanish words a day.
translation.es: Mi padre nos hacía aprender cien palabras en español por día.

translation.en: -One hundred. -No more, no less.
I was...
I was terrible.
I just wanted to ride horses and explore Tucumán.
translation.es: Solo quería andar a caballo y explorar Tucumán.

translation.en: What part of the Fatherland are you from?
translation.es: ¿De qué parte de la madre patria eres?

translation.en: [man] We moved all over during the war.
translation.es: Nos mudamos mucho durante la guerra.

translation.en: Oh, so your father, he was in the army?
SS, actually.
But he was killed in the East.
translation.es: Pero lo mataron en el Este.

translation.en: Oh, I thought, I thought...
[man] We live with my uncle now, Ricardo. He's, uh...
translation.es: Ahora vivimos con mi tío Ricardo. Él es...

translation.en: He's like a father to us.
[woman] I'm so sorry, Klaus.
That's awful.
Do you ever think about going back?
[Klaus] To Germany?
Um, I don't know.
I'm told things.
What things?
Oh, the Jews, clawing power back,
translation.es: Que los judíos recuperaron el poder,

translation.en: taking jobs, corrupting everything, like before.
translation.es: tomaron empleos y corrompieron todo, como antes.

translation.en: But, of course, there are plenty of them here too so...
translation.es: Pero, por supuesto, aquí también hay muchos.

translation.en: My uncle says they pop up everywhere, like mushrooms after rain.
translation.es: Mi tío dice que brotan por todos lados, como los hongos después de la lluvia.

translation.en: -Mushrooms. -[Klaus chuckles]
-[laughing] Mushrooms. -[woman laughs out loud]
A toast.
To your father.
A hero, I'm sure.
Tell me, would I recognize his name?
[man 1] Mr. Harel.
Mr. Harel. Just five minutes.
[man 2] Herr Harel, please. Sir, this is Herr Fritz Bauer,
translation.es: Herr Harel, por favor. Él es herr Fritz Bauer, fiscal de Hesse en Alemania Occidental.

translation.en: he's the District Attorney of Hessen in West Germany.
translation.es: Él es herr Fritz Bauer, fiscal de Hesse en Alemania Occidental.

translation.en: He says he's found someone.
[Herr Fritz Bauer] I have a lead on a great enemy of our people.
translation.es: Tengo una pista de un gran enemigo nuestro.

translation.en: I don't have time for this. Rafi, take care of it, okay?
[Herr Fritz Bauer] Adolf Eichmann is not just some pencil pusher.
translation.es: Adolf Eichmann no es un simple burócrata.

translation.en: This man deserves to be punished.
[Harel] You have the word of a blind man.
translation.es: Es la palabra de un ciego.

translation.en: [Bauer] He doesn't need his eyes to hear the boy's name. Klaus Eichmann.
translation.es: No necesita ver para oír el nombre del chico: Klaus Eichmann.

translation.en: [Harel] Why would this girl, Sylvia, date a Nazi's son?
translation.es: ¿Por qué esta muchacha, Sylvia, saldría con el hijo de un nazi?

translation.en: Hermann spent time in Dachau; he decided to raise Sylvia Catholic.
translation.es: Hermann estuvo en Dachau. Decidió criar a Sylvia como católica.

translation.en: [Rafi] She didn't know she was Jewish?
Has he broken the bad news to her yet?
translation.es: ¿Y ya le dio la mala noticia?

translation.en: [Bauer chuckles] Yeah. She insists on seeing him still.
translation.es: Sí. Y aun así, quiere salir con él.

translation.en: Says she's a good Catholic and the boy is, too.
translation.es: Dice que es buena católica y que él también.

translation.en: [Harel] Okay. Thank you.
Listen, I really appreciate your coming,
translation.es: Mire, le agradezco que haya venido,

translation.en: but you have to understand. I got Egypt wreaking havoc,
translation.es: pero tiene que entender. Los fedayines están causando estragos en Egipto.

translation.en: the Fedayeen. Hikers getting killed at Masada.
translation.es: Los fedayines están causando estragos en Egipto. Asesinaron a unos senderistas en Masada. Tenemos pocos recursos.

translation.en: Our resources are limited.
translation.es: Asesinaron a unos senderistas en Masada. Tenemos pocos recursos.

translation.en: I can't waste them chasing rumors. I'm sorry.
translation.es: No puedo desperdiciarlos en rumores. Lo siento.

translation.en: Think what it means.
Jews finally, publicly, holding to account the man who organized our slaughter.
translation.es: Al fin, los judíos exigirían explicaciones al hombre que organizó nuestra matanza.

translation.en: Organized. Past tense.
It is my job, Herr Bauer, to focus on those who are planning it today.
translation.es: Mi trabajo es concentrarme en quienes planean hacerlo hoy en día.

translation.en: Thank you very much for coming.
-Please-- -[Harel] Thank you very much.
Just give me one second.
Sir?
Let's say he's right.
Can you imagine the headache when he tells the world
translation.es: ¿Imagina el problema cuando le diga al mundo

translation.en: that we wouldn't waste our resources on the architect of the Final Solution?
translation.es: que no quisimos gastar recursos en el arquitecto de la Solución Final?

translation.en: [man] Slowly.
Slowly.
What are you...?
Shall we just stand here?
You're waving at my crotch in a weird way. Just get in there. Don't be afraid.
translation.es: Haces algo raro hacia mi entrepierna. Golpéame, sin miedo.

translation.en: I'm not afraid, we're focusing on technique.
translation.es: No es miedo. Nos enfocamos en la técnica.

translation.en: Okay, well technically, do it better.
translation.es: Bueno, entonces, haz mejor la técnica.

translation.en: You know why they throw all the shittiest jobs at you, right?
translation.es: ¿Sabes por qué te dan los peores trabajos?

translation.en: I don't know, antisemitism?
Shall we?
Don't be scared.
-Hey. -Hey, Rafi.
-[Rafi] Aharoni, come with me. -[Aharoni] You got it.
-Where you going? -[Rafi] Aharoni's got a flight to catch.
translation.es: ¿Adónde van? Aharoni tiene que tomar un vuelo.

translation.en: I'll call if I need you.
-[Klaus] Sylvia. -Thank you.
-[Sylvia] Klaus, hi. -Hey.
You made it.
-Let me show you through. -Could we go somewhere first?
-I need to tell you something. Okay. -Can we wait? He's about to speak.
translation.es: - Debo decirte algo. - En un minuto. Está por hablar.

translation.en: -[Klaus] This is Sylvia. -[Sylvia] Hello.
My word.
Look at those eyes. Your hair.
translation.es: Mira esos ojos. Y ese cabello.

translation.en: Where's your family from?
-[Sylvia] Um, I'm... -[man] We're ready for you.
Come.
[Klaus] You see those two?
That's the Deputy Mayor and a member of Parliament.
translation.es: Son el subalcalde y un miembro del Congreso.

translation.en: [Sylvia] Who is that man you introduced me to?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el hombre que me presentaste?

translation.en: [Klaus] Carlos Fuldner. He helped my family settle in Argentina.
translation.es: Carlos Fuldner. Ayudó a mi familia a instalarse en Argentina.

translation.en: our hundred fiftieth Independence Day approaches.
translation.es: Se acerca nuestro 150º Día de la Independencia.

translation.en: [Carlos] There will be a chance for us to dance,
to drink, for freedom.
translation.es: de beber y de ser libres.

translation.en: [Carlos] But have you noticed the road blocks...
...gunshots,
violence,
every day across Buenos Aires?
translation.es: que hay todos los días en Buenos Aires?

translation.en: Now should be the time to celebrate our national unity,
translation.es: Este debería ser el momento de celebrar nuestra unidad nacional...

translation.en: the iron bond of church and state.
translation.es: ...la unión férrea entre la Iglesia y el Estado.

translation.en: It doesn't decay, amigos.
A rot within our society,
translation.es: Hay una podredumbre en nuestra sociedad

translation.en: that is forcing us to fight for our beloved and holy patria.
translation.es: que nos obliga a pelear por nuestra amada y sagrada patria.

translation.en: Who can tell me its name?
Jew!
[in Spanish] Thank you, Father.
Loyal only to themselves.
translation.es: Solo son leales a sí mismos.

translation.en: The Jew will betray our homeland
translation.es: Los judíos traicionarán a nuestra patria

translation.en: and continue poisoning this great nation of Argentina.
translation.es: y seguirán envenenando esta gran nación que es Argentina.

translation.en: So, I ask you.
What should we do with the Jew?
Soap.
Again.
What must we make of the Jew?
[crowd] Soap!
-Jew! Jew! Jew! -[crowd] Soap! Soap! Soap!
[male player 1] Okay. Are you in, or are you out?
-[male player 2] In. -[male player 1] Peter, your turn.
[male player 1] Peter, let's go. Play.
Come on, kids.
Hello.
Mama?
Mama, what's wrong? What happened?
[mother] Your sister.
She was on top and I closed it.
It's all right. I'm sure she forgives you.
Look.
Beautiful.
Go put them in some water. I'll clean up.
translation.es: Ve a ponerlas en agua, yo limpiaré.

translation.en: New refrigerator, huh?
Who'd you kill to get that?
Seriously, should I worry? Is there a dead body in there?
translation.es: En serio, ¿debo preocuparme? ¿Hay un cadáver ahí?

translation.en: I haven't seen Hanna lately.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no veo a Hanna.

translation.en: Mama, please.
What? First you see her all the time.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Primero, la ves todo el tiempo.

translation.en: -No relationship talk. -You were ready...
translation.es: - No hablemos de eso. - Estabas listo.

translation.en: -We've been over this. Eat your soup. -...to start something. Poof. She's gone.
translation.es: - Ya lo hablamos. Come la sopa. - Y ¡puf! Desaparece.

translation.en: Please.
Peter, don't you dare. It's Shabbat.
translation.es: Peter, no te atrevas. Es sabbat.

translation.en: It could be an emergency.
Don't come complaining to me if you get sick after eating cold soup.
translation.es: Luego no te quejes si te enfermas por comer sopa fría.

translation.en: Who gets sick from eating cold soup? Ma, please. Hello.
translation.es: ¿Quién se enferma por comer sopa fría, mamá? ¿Hola?

translation.en: Is this about the Astypalaia thing?
Because, to be honest, I've read maybe 70% of the briefing.
translation.es: Porque solo leí un 70 % del informe.

translation.en: -[Rafi] No, it is not. -Okay, good, 'cause it's more like 30%.
translation.es: No, no es eso. Bien, porque fue más un 30 %.

translation.en: Finale.
[Rafi] Aharoni's out there now running reconnaissance in Buenos Aires
translation.es: Aharoni está haciendo el reconocimiento en Buenos Aires

translation.en: with our guy at the Embassy.
translation.es: con nuestro hombre en la embajada.

translation.en: Our contact's daughter, Sylvia Hermann,
translation.es: La hija de nuestro contacto, Sylvia Hermann,

translation.en: has agreed to take us to Klaus Eichmann's family home.
translation.es: accedió a llevarnos a la casa de Klaus Eichmann.

translation.en: If it is Eichmann, they will attempt to get a positive photo ID.
translation.es: Si es Eichmann, intentarán obtener una identificación fotográfica.

translation.en: Why didn't you ask me? Aharoni's an interrogator.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me enviaste a mí? Aharoni es interrogador.

translation.en: [Rafi] Precisely.
I wanted someone who would interrogate the evidence rather than just shoot at it.
translation.es: Necesitamos interrogar la evidencia, no dispararle.

translation.en: This is strictly catch and extract.
translation.es: Solo hay que atraparlo y traerlo.

translation.en: Raf, if it is him, a bullet would be easier than dragging him here.
translation.es: Raf, si es él, dispararle será más fácil que traerlo a la fuerza.

translation.en: Eichmann will stand trial here in Israel.
translation.es: Eichmann irá a juicio aquí en Israel.

translation.en: Trial? Nobody needs to hear what he has to say.
[Rafi] The Prime Minister disagrees.
translation.es: El primer ministro no opina igual.

translation.en: A trial will help put all of this to bed.
translation.es: Un juicio ayudará a cerrar este asunto.

translation.en: After all, not everyone's as emotionally balanced as you are.
translation.es: No todos tienen tu equilibrio emocional.

translation.en: Peter, it isn't about you, okay?
translation.es: Peter, esto no se trata de ti, ¿sí?

translation.en: Okay. I'm in.
[Harel] You're not going.
Every op leader describes you as manipulative, impulsive and self-absorbed.
translation.es: Tus superiores te describen como manipulador, impulsivo y egocéntrico.

translation.en: [Peter] No one mentioned my sense of humor? [Harel] And the fiasco in Austria.
translation.es: - Nadie mencionó mi sentido del humor. - Ni el fiasco en Austria.

translation.en: The strings I had to pull. You killed the wrong damn Nazi!
translation.es: Moví influencias. Mataste al nazi equivocado.

translation.en: I remember, sir. It wasn't even the right Nazi.
translation.es: Lo recuerdo, señor. Me equivoqué de nazi.

translation.en: We are talking about violating Argentina's sovereignty
translation.es: Hablamos de violar la soberanía argentina

translation.en: while they are celebrating 150 years of independence.
translation.es: mientras celebran los 150 años de independencia.

translation.en: If we fail, Israel will be humiliated,
the local Jews terrorized, and I've lost some of my best agents.
translation.es: Intimidarán a los judíos locales y perderé a mis mejores hombres.

translation.en: So, what makes him worth the risk?
For starters, this current plan's a real piece of shit.
translation.es: Para empezar, este plan es una mierda.

translation.en: [Harel] Great start.
[Rafi] Peter.
If you wanna get him out alive, you need a basic crew.
translation.es: Si quieren traerlo con vida, necesitan un grupo básico.

translation.en: No soldiers, no guns. Period.
If we get into a shoot-out, we've failed already
translation.es: Si hay un tiroteo, ya fracasamos.

translation.en: and it says here that you want to extract him
translation.es: Y aquí dice que quieren traerlo

translation.en: via shipping container, but that would take weeks.
translation.es: en un contenedor, pero tardaría semanas.

translation.en: We do that, he won't make it past Rio. The only way is by plane.
translation.es: Así no pasará de Río. La única forma es en avión.

translation.en: [Harel] Military planes can't reach Argentina.
translation.es: Nuestros aviones militares no van a Argentina.

translation.en: You think I haven't thought about it?
No, I'm sorry. Of course, sir. Of course.
translation.es: No, lo siento. Por supuesto, señor.

translation.en: I'm guessing El Al is not an option.
translation.es: Supongo que El Al no es una opción.

translation.en: El Al doesn't fly commercially to Argentina.
translation.es: No tiene vuelos comerciales a Argentina.

translation.en: Perhaps if we had a good cover story, they could be convinced?
translation.es: Tal vez podamos convencerlos con un buen pretexto.

translation.en: Maybe.
[Peter] You said it's Argentina's 150th anniversary, right?
translation.es: ¿Dijo que era el 150º aniversario de Argentina?

translation.en: Yeah.
So we get ambassadors, politicians, whatever,
send them over there to say, "Mazel tov. Hurrah for independence."
translation.es: Envíelos a decirles: "Mazel tov por la independencia".

translation.en: [Rafi] We'll invite Abba Eban, everybody loves him.
translation.es: Invitaremos a Abba Eban, todos lo aman.

translation.en: Then we sneak Eichmann on board, airlift him here direct.
translation.es: Luego subimos a Eichmann a escondidas y lo traemos directo.

translation.en: [Harel] What about airport security?
I'll disguise him to look like one of us.
-[Rafi] He'll struggle. -We'll sedate him.
Make him seem hung over, drunk to shit.
[Harel] To keep him in that state for hours.
-The only agent that we have-- -[Rafi] Had.
What?
She's refused every job I've offered her after Bren.
translation.es: Rechazó todos los trabajos que le ofrecí después de lo de Bren.

translation.en: That wasn't Hanna's fault though. The guy was allergic, right?
translation.es: Pero eso no fue culpa de Hanna. El tipo era alérgico, ¿no?

translation.en: She's the only one with the right field experience for this.
translation.es: Es la única con experiencia para algo así.

translation.en: -I'll get her to do it. -I thought you two weren't...
translation.es: - La convenceré. - Pero ustedes ya no...

translation.en: -What, together? -Speaking.
She'll do it, trust me. Sir...
translation.es: Lo hará. Confíe en mí. Señor.

translation.en: we'll get him back here alive.
Get Hanna on board, then we talk.
translation.es: Consigan que Hanna acepte y luego hablamos.

translation.en: -Five minutes. Hear me out. -I don't wanna hear.
Is Mrs. Levington in prep? ECG done?
-You know how important this is. -Hi, Michael. See you tonight.
translation.es: - Por favor, es importante. - Hola, Michael. Te veré esta noche.

translation.en: Who's Michael?
What's tonight?
The trains that shipped the families to the camps, that was him.
translation.es: Él ideó lo de los trenes que llevaban las familias a los campos.

translation.en: -I'm not joining your hit squad. -[Peter] No, that...
translation.es: No me uniré a tu escuadrón asesino. No, eso...

translation.en: Yes, I would happily put a bullet in-between his eyes,
translation.es: Sí, con gusto le daría un tiro en la cabeza,

translation.en: but that's not what we're doing.
Did you hear what happened last time?
translation.es: ¿Te enteraste de lo que pasó la última vez?

translation.en: Yeah. Rafi told me. The guy was allergic.
translation.es: Sí, me lo contó Rafi. El tipo era alérgico.

translation.en: That's what he told you?
[Hanna] No, we kept on landing and refueling.
Rafi kept telling me to put him under again and again and again.
translation.es: Rafi me decía que lo durmiera una y otra vez.

translation.en: So, I did.
That was Rafi's fault, not yours.
translation.es: Entonces fue culpa de Rafi, no tuya.

translation.en: My needle, my fault.
First do no harm, that's what we swear, and I won't break it, not again!
translation.es: Juramos no hacer daño y no romperé el juramento otra vez.

translation.en: That's why we need you.
In Buenos Aires.
Where we'll need you to eat steak.
And drink red wine and definitely go tango dancing.
translation.es: Beber vino tinto... ...y, sin duda, bailar tango.

translation.en: I need you.
-[Aharoni] Another road block. -[man] For the 150th.
The government says they're protecting democracy.
translation.es: El Gobierno dice que es para proteger la democracia.

translation.en: They're all over the city.
What are they so afraid of?
[man] Commies.
Jews.
Nacionalistas, Peronistas. Depends who you ask.
translation.es: Nacionalistas, peronistas. Según a quién le preguntes.

translation.en: You clear on the plan?
Knock on the door, deliver the gift, get his uncle outside, don't give them cause for suspicion.
translation.es: Tocar a la puerta, entregar el presente, hacer salir al tío, no generar sospechas.

translation.en: Enough of that to go around already.
[Aharoni] Listen carefully, all right?
If you're feeling any kind of danger whatsoever, you get out.
translation.es: Si te sientes en peligro, sales.

translation.en: It's going to be all right.
Yes. May I help you?
Hello. My name is Sylvia. I'm...
You're the Sylvia.
We wondered whether we would get to meet you.
Well, come in.
-Come in. -Thank you.
Oh, I'll just...
[Sylvia] Oh my, those are beautiful.
Oh, aren't they?
Is it a special occasion?
This year even more so.
Smell them.
Smell them.
Oh, hello there.
[woman] Oh, darling. This is Sylvia.
The Sylvia.
Such a pleasure.
[Sylvia] Klaus and I had a bit of a disagreement,
translation.es: Klaus y yo tuvimos un pequeño desacuerdo,

translation.en: so I thought I would come over and... try to fix things.
translation.es: así que pensé en venir e intentar arreglar las cosas.

translation.en: That's very thoughtful.
I'll make us come coffee.
Oh, no thank you. I can't stay long.
No, please. We're delighted to have you.
translation.es: No, por favor. Es un placer para nosotros.

translation.en: [Eichmann] The munchkin is ready for a nap.
translation.es: El niño está listo para su siesta.

translation.en: Papa is ready for munchkin to have his nap. -[Eichmann chuckles] -[baby laughs]
translation.es: Papá está listo para que el niño duerma la siesta.

translation.en: So, what do you think?
I'm sorry?
The house.
I mean, there's still no electricity, but she's getting there.
translation.es: Todavía no tiene electricidad, pero pronto.

translation.en: Yes, it's quite lovely, Herr...?
Klement. Señor Klement.
I'm sorry.
[Eichmann] The disagreement you had.
I don't wish to pry, but would you describe to me its nature?
translation.es: No quiero ser entrometido, pero ¿me contarías por qué fue?

translation.en: [Klaus] Sylvia, what are you doing here?
-[Eichmann] Hey, watch your tone, Klaus. -I just came to apologize.
translation.es: Cuida el tono, Klaus. Vine a disculparme.

translation.en: Klaus, you're just in time for coffee.
translation.es: Klaus, llegas justo para el café.

translation.en: No. Sylvia's leaving.
Now hold on just a minute.
Klaus. I said wait a moment.
translation.es: Klaus, dije que esperaras un momento.

translation.en: This is how I taught you to behave, is it?
I'm sorry, Father.
You've no need to call me that.
[Klaus] Sylvia.
[Klaus] Sylvia.
-[Aharoni] Did you get it? -[man] I don't know.
[Aharoni] What about the girl?
She'll take the bus.
Get out of here.
Listen.
You embarrassed me.
-Leaving the meeting like that. -I know.
translation.es: - Al irte así de la reunión. - Lo sé.

translation.en: I had to leave, and I'm sorry.
He said he thought you might be a...
I am.
[Sylvia] Does that really matter to you?
[Rafi] Isser is here.
[Rafi] This is Dani Shalom from documents, and you know Moshe, he'd handle the vehicles.
translation.es: Él es Dani Shalom, de Documentación. Moshe se encargará de los vehículos.

translation.en: [Harel] Where's Hanna?
Sorry I'm late, sir.
That steak better be good.
translation.es: Espero que el bistec esté bueno.

translation.en: [Harel] Okay.
[Harel] This is everything Sylvia Hermann could give us.
translation.es: Esto es todo lo que Sylvia Hermann pudo darnos.

translation.en: As for the pictures, our guy at Tel Hashomer Hospital is saying the ears match.
translation.es: En cuanto a las fotos, nuestro contacto dice que las orejas coinciden.

translation.en: Hardly compelling evidence.
Sylvia heard Klaus call him father.
-"You don't need to call me that." -[Harel] Not enough.
You have to make sure it's him. Give me documentary proof. Come on.
translation.es: Debemos estar seguros. Denme pruebas con documentos.

translation.en: Wait. Look.
The flowers.
-Here. -Vera implied it was a special occasion.
translation.es: - Aquí. - Vera habla de una ocasión especial.

translation.en: "This year even more so."
-What date was Sylvia there? -Uh...
[Hanna] Here.
The marriage certificate.
-[Rafi] Hey, careful. -Like it makes a difference.
There's a system to this.
[Peter] Here.
Why is 1960 a special year?
Because 25 years ago Adolf Eichmann
translation.es: Porque, hace 25 años, Adolf Eichmann se casó con su esposa Vera Liebl el 21 de marzo.

translation.en: married his wife, Vera Liebl, on the 21st of March.
translation.es: Adolf Eichmann se casó con su esposa Vera Liebl el 21 de marzo.

translation.en: [Peter] We have our guy.
Ricardo Klement is Adolf Eichmann.
[Peter] All right. Round two.
-[piano playing] -[Peter] Next week in Buenos Aires.
Yaakov, welcome. Our wonderful front man.
He's a little ugly, but we'll make do, right?
translation.es: Es un poco feo, pero servirá, ¿no?

translation.en: Okay. For the ones who can't.
May his name be obliterated, huh?
So, why are we making him famous?
[Moshe] We should be putting him down like a mad dog.
translation.es: Deberíamos sacrificarlo como a un perro rabioso.

translation.en: That's not what I'm here for, Moshe.
translation.es: No estoy aquí para eso, Moshe.

translation.en: [Moshe] Yeah?
How many did you lose?
I'm not competing with you.
What?
-We're really doing this? -Yeah.
[Yaakov] All right, asshole.
My parents, aunts, uncles, four cousins.
[Dani Shalom] I'm the only one left.
[Peter] Hey, Moshe, enough.
All right? Raf, you know any rock 'n roll?
Is the Pope Catholic?
-[piano playing cheerful music] -This.
-Shall we dance, yeah? Let's. -Let's dance.
[Harel] On your feet for the Prime Minister.
translation.es: De pie ante al primer ministro.

translation.en: [Rafi] Oh, shit. It's Ben-Gurion. Get up. Get up.
[man] Sir.
-Is this all of them? -Yes.
[Ben-Gurion] Good.
If you succeed...
we deny the world the chance to let Eichmann's...
murderous edicts sink into obscurity.
translation.es: ...de que los edictos homicidas de Eichmann caigan en el olvido.

translation.en: For the first time in our history, we will judge our executioner.
translation.es: Por primera vez en nuestra historia, juzgaremos a nuestro verdugo.

translation.en: We will also warn off any who may wish to follow his example.
translation.es: Será una advertencia para quien quiera seguir su ejemplo.

translation.en: If you fail...
he escapes justice.
Perhaps forever.
For the sake of our people, I beg you, do not fail.
translation.es: Por el bien de nuestro pueblo, les ruego que no fracasen.

translation.en: [Ben-Gurion] Our memory reaches back through recorded history.
translation.es: Nuestra memoria se basa en la historia escrita.

translation.en: [Ben-Gurion] The book of memories still lies open.
translation.es: El libro de la memoria sigue abierto.

translation.en: And you here now...
are the hand that holds the pen.
translation.es: ...son la mano que sostiene la pluma.

translation.en: Why have they sent you?
-Disappointed? -[chuckles]
Keep your hands to yourself.
Or Malkin will kick my ass?
I'll kick your ass.
There's still the thing with you two.
[Yaakov] He'll let you down, you know?
[Yaakov] He lets everyone down.
[Yaakov] Ladies and gentlemen, behold, terra, the best safe house money can buy.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, bienvenidos a Terra. La casa más segura que el dinero puede pagar.

translation.en: With the finest in counter-surveillance technology.
translation.es: Lo mejor en tecnología de contravigilancia.

translation.en: [Eichmann] I've lived enough of life looking over my shoulder.
translation.es: Pasé gran parte de mi vida cuidándome las espaldas.

translation.en: I only did what little I could in Germany's fight against her enemy.
translation.es: Hice lo poco que pude en la lucha de Alemania contra su enemigo.

translation.en: [Carlos] What a narrative. What tales.
[Carlos] Tell me, these story telling sessions, are they for money or for pleasure?
translation.es: Dígame, ¿cuenta estas historias por dinero o por placer?

translation.en: For posterity, to correct the lies told by those swine at Nuremberg.
translation.es: Para la posteridad. Para corregir las mentiras de esos cerdos en Núremberg.

translation.en: You left so quickly after our rally, we didn't have a chance to talk.
translation.es: Se fue muy rápido después del acto. No tuvimos oportunidad de hablar.

translation.en: I wasn't aware a discussion was to be had, Carlos.
translation.es: No sabía que habría un debate, Carlos.

translation.en: You saw the support we have.
The government is teetering. Soon we can come out of the shadows.
translation.es: El gobierno está inestable. Pronto podremos salir de las sombras.

translation.en: All we need is organization.
A mind like yours.
-[Peter] Who's this Fuldner guy? -[Aharoni] SS Officer.
translation.es: ¿Quién es ese tal Fuldner? Un oficial de la SS.

translation.en: Worked with the Vatican,
translation.es: Trabajó con el Vaticano y con Perón

translation.en: then Peron to get Hitler's higher-ranking officers out of Europe.
translation.es: para sacar de Europa a los oficiales de Hitler con alto rango.

translation.en: They keep a low profile, but they'll make themselves known if we slip up.
translation.es: Mantienen un perfil bajo, pero se darán a conocer si cometemos un error.

translation.en: -I've written this all down. -Oh.
Yeah, I'll read this.
Right.
[Peter] The man is a human metronome.
Every morning he goes to work at a Mercedes factory in Gonzales Catan,
translation.es: Cada mañana va a trabajar a una fábrica de Mercedes en González Catán.

translation.en: same time, same two buses, there and back.
translation.es: Misma hora, mismos autobuses ida y vuelta.

translation.en: [man] Why don't we grab him at the factory?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo atrapamos en la fábrica?

translation.en: [Rafi] It's too public. One witness and we're screwed.
translation.es: Hay mucha gente. Un testigo podría delatarnos.

translation.en: [Peter] And on his journey home it's darker, there's fewer witnesses.
translation.es: Cuando regresa está más oscuro, hay menos testigos. 7 DE MAYO, 1960

translation.en: [Dani] Any blind spots?
There are lamp posts here, here, and here.
translation.es: Hay postes de luz aquí, aquí y aquí.

translation.en: There's a blind spot about five meters. Should be pitch black at night.
translation.es: Hay un punto ciego de cinco metros. Debería estar muy oscuro de noche.

translation.en: That's where you grab him,
and then hold him here a few hours ahead of flying.
translation.es: y lo retendrán aquí unas horas antes del vuelo.

translation.en: -[Peter] Can we get him to the airport? -No, It's too dangerous.
translation.es: - ¿No vamos directo al aeropuerto? - No, es muy riesgoso.

translation.en: [Hanna] I'll be giving him micro doses of Haloperidol throughout security.
translation.es: Le daré microdosis de haloperidol mientras pasamos los controles.

translation.en: The set-up needs to be precise, so fixing it in the back of the car, it's too risky.
translation.es: La preparación debe ser precisa, hacerlo en el auto es muy arriesgado.

translation.en: The wrong dose and he could slip into cardiac arrest.
translation.es: Con la dosis incorrecta, podría tener un paro cardíaco.

translation.en: Okay. Everyone got what they need?
[Yaakov] Strips of soft metal.
-[Harel] Okay. -Tin, ideally.
[Ilani] Write it down.
I'm putting together a squad of sayanim to help.
translation.es: Reuniré un grupo de sayanim para que los ayude.

translation.en: Are we sure we can trust the local Jews to be loyal to us and not the Argentines?
translation.es: ¿Los judíos locales serán leales a nosotros y no a los argentinos?

translation.en: Yeah. Efraim worked with them before, right?
translation.es: Sí. Ephraim ya trabajó con ellos.

translation.en: Yeah, that's correct. They know the city, speak the language.
translation.es: Así es. Ellos conocen la ciudad y hablan el idioma.

translation.en: They'll help limit our exposure.
People are gonna say it's a real international Jewish conspiracy.
translation.es: La gente dirá que es una conspiración internacional judía.

translation.en: -[everyone chuckles] -[Harel] Okay. Hey, the plane will arrive in four days.
translation.es: Escuchen. El avión llegará en cuatro días.

translation.en: This is the last time you're gonna see me until we have him.
translation.es: Esta es la última vez que me verán hasta atraparlo.

translation.en: If you need me, leave me a note at the Embassy.
translation.es: Si me necesitan, dejen una nota en la embajada.

translation.en: Otherwise, no contact in case I'm followed.
translation.es: Si no, no me contacten, por si me siguen.

translation.en: We'll exchange money and documents in cafes.
translation.es: Intercambiaremos dinero y documentos en cafés.

translation.en: From now on, every move you make, and every second it takes,
translation.es: De ahora en más, cada movimiento y cada segundo cuentan.

translation.en: counts for everything, so don't make any stupid mistakes.
translation.es: De ahora en más, cada movimiento y cada segundo cuentan. No cometan errores tontos.

translation.en: That's very inspiring.
-[Moshe] What about his family? -[radio in Spanish]
[Moshe] What if they call the police or worse?
translation.es: ¿Y si llaman a la policía o algo peor?

translation.en: [Peter] Authorities aren't gonna stick their necks out for a Nazi on Independence Day.
translation.es: Las autoridades no se arriesgarán por un nazi el Día de la Independencia.

translation.en: And the safe house still isn't right. I'm telling you. Three days isn't enough.
translation.es: La casa aún no está lista. Repito, tres días no alcanzan.

translation.en: We're gonna make it work. Relax. Stop worrying.
[Moshe] Sounds like Khrushchev got some American.
translation.es: Parece que Kruschev atrapó a un estadounidense.

translation.en: -Spy pilot I think. -[Peter] Shit.
translation.es: Creo que a un piloto espía. Carajo.

translation.en: Poor guy.
I hear the Commies like to use their fingernails, tear 'em out.
translation.es: Oí que a los comunistas les gusta usar las uñas. Se las arrancan.

translation.en: [Peter] Shots of adrenaline straight after, stops you from fainting.
translation.es: Y enseguida les inyectan adrenalina para evitar que se desmayen.

translation.en: [Moshe] Think the Argies would do that to us?
translation.es: ¿Crees que los argentinos nos harían eso?

translation.en: [Moshe] You ever think about whether we'll get to do that to him?
translation.es: ¿No piensas en si nosotros se lo haremos a él?

translation.en: [Peter] That's not why we're here.
[Moshe] Come on, Habibi.
You're telling me that after what that fuck did to us,
translation.es: Con todo lo que esa basura nos hizo,

translation.en: you didn't want someone here ready and willing to make him scream?
translation.es: ¿no querrías que alguien lo hiciera sufrir?

translation.en: -You can have the bed, sir. -Yaakov, son of a bitch.
translation.es: Puede usar la cama, señor. Yaakov, hijo de puta.

translation.en: -[Hanna] Do you want another one? -[Peter] Maybe.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres que lo haga yo? - Tal vez.

translation.en: One more.
-Hey, Moshe. -[Moshe] Yeah.
Talk to me.
I saw him with his boy.
His son. Beautiful little boy.
translation.es: Su hijo. Un pequeño muy lindo.

translation.en: They were watching the trains go by.
We're gonna get him.
He needs catching first.
Who the hell was that?
You ever seen that guy before?
[Peter] Here he comes.
I don't wanna touch his mouth.
-[Peter] Where is he? -[Rafi] Shit. He knows. He must know.
[Aharoni] We need to leave.
His wife and kid are home. He wouldn't leave without them.
translation.es: No escaparía sin su esposa y su hijo.

translation.en: -[Rafi] He's done it before. -We have to warn the others.
translation.es: - No sería la primera vez. - Hay que avisar.

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go!
Look.
Him..
-[Moshe] It's him. -[Aharoni] Why is there a second bus?
translation.es: Es él. ¿Por qué en el segundo autobús?

translation.en: And that cyclist. I don't know, something feels off.
translation.es: Y lo del ciclista. No sé, algo huele mal.

translation.en: Your call.
Start the engine.
-Get the sedative. I got him. -Make a sound and I'll kill you.
translation.es: - El sedante, yo lo tengo. - Un sonido y lo mato.

translation.en: [Peter] Just be quiet, you'll be all right.
[Rafi] Okay. Let's go.
[Peter] Cover his hands.
If you speak without being spoken to, you will be gagged.
translation.es: Si habla sin que le hablen, lo amordazaremos.

translation.en: Open your eyes.
I want you to tell me your name.
translation.es: Quiero que me diga su nombre.

translation.en: [Eichmann] My name is Ricardo Klement. I'm a Jew from Palestine.
translation.es: Soy Ricardo Klement, un judío de Palestina.

translation.en: No, you're not.
[Eichmann] I was born in Serona, the German quarter. I know my prayers. Listen.
translation.es: Nací en Sarona, el distrito alemán. Sé rezar. Escuche.

translation.en: Tell me your name.
[Eichmann] You see?
You've made a mistake.
Drop me anywhere. Blindfold me.
translation.es: Déjenme donde quieran, con los ojos vendados.

translation.en: I won't tell anyone what you've done.
translation.es: No le diré a nadie lo que hicieron.

translation.en: I'll admit I'm a little rusty.
translation.es: Admito que estoy un poco oxidado.

translation.en: You were born in Solingen in 1906.
Your father was named Adolf.
-Your mother Maria Shefferling. -I don't know those names.
translation.es: - Su madre, Maria Schefferling. - No conozco esos nombres.

translation.en: It's not true. My surname's Klement.
translation.es: No es cierto. Mi apellido es Klement.

translation.en: Yet the boy you raise has the name Eichmann, does he not?
translation.es: Pero el muchacho que cría se apellida Eichmann, ¿no?

translation.en: His father died during the war.
translation.es: Su padre murió en la guerra.

translation.en: So, you let another man's progeny call you father.
translation.es: Y deja que el hijo de otro hombre lo llame "padre".

translation.en: What is your current profession? Foreman. Mercedes Benz factory.
translation.es: - ¿A qué se dedica? - Capataz en la fábrica de Mercedes Benz.

translation.en: -Current address. -14 Garibaldi Street.
-What is-- -What is your wife's name?
Who is your son Klaus's father? What is your name?
translation.es: ¿Quién es el padre de Klaus? ¿Cómo se llama usted?

translation.en: I am Ricardo Klement.
So, you raise another man's child, but you feel only obligation, correct?
translation.es: Entonces cría al hijo de otro hombre solo por obligación, ¿correcto?

translation.en: Should something happen to him, like,
oh, I don't know, let's say he should suddenly...
translation.es: no sé, digamos, si de pronto...

translation.en: disappear tomorrow,
a part of you wouldn't care?
You once had a mistress named Maria Masenbucher.
translation.es: Tuvo una amante llamada Maria Mösenbacher, ¿no es cierto?

translation.en: -Did you not? -Not that I recall.
translation.es: Tuvo una amante llamada Maria Mösenbacher, ¿no es cierto? No que recuerde.

translation.en: That's interesting, because she gave us a picture.
translation.es: Qué interesante, ella nos dio una fotografía.

translation.en: Do you recognize the man in this picture?
I can't see him clearly.
Who has his glasses?
The man in this picture is you.
translation.es: El hombre en la foto es usted.

translation.en: SS number 45381. Am I correct?
Again. Your number was 45381.
[Aharoni] Your number was 45381.

translation.es: Era cuatro, cinco, tres, dos, seis.

translation.en: Enough. I accept my fate.
My name is Adolf Eichmann.
-[Rafi] All right. -[Hanna laughs]
[Rafi] Enjoy. We pack up after dinner.
translation.es: Disfruten. Empacaremos después de la cena.

translation.en: What's wrong?
[Peter] We've got him.
Peace?
My mama spends her days in a dark apartment alone,
translation.es: Mi madre pasa sus días en un apartamento oscuro... ...sola, por lo que hicieron hombres como él.

translation.en: because of what men like him have done.
translation.es: ...sola, por lo que hicieron hombres como él.

translation.en: When she can see the look on Eichmann's face when he finds himself in a country full of us,
translation.es: Cuando ella vea la expresión de Eichmann al estar en un país lleno de nosotros...

translation.en: that's when I'll have peace.
Come on, Klaus. Rack your brain. Who knew?
translation.es: Vamos, Klaus, has un esfuerzo. ¿Quién sabía?

translation.en: [Peter] All right, let's get changed and get out of here.
translation.es: Bien, cámbiense y salgamos de aquí.

translation.en: [Ilani] Listen everyone.
There is a problem with the flight. -[Peter] What? -[Harel] What?
translation.es: - Hay un problema con el vuelo. - ¿Qué?

translation.en: The airport says it's delayed by ten days.
-Nobody knows. -[Peter] Shit. Ten days! Oh, shit.
It's coincidence. It's too soon for anyone to know.
translation.es: Debe ser coincidencia, es muy pronto para que lo sepan.

translation.en: -Not if they found the glasses. -[Aharoni] They know.
translation.es: - No si hallaron los lentes. - Lo saben.

translation.en: [Rafi] Okay. Ephraim, tomorrow morning you and Moshe, you return the cars.
translation.es: Bueno, Ephraim, mañana Moshe y tú devolverán los autos.

translation.en: If they quibble about damages, you pay whatever they say.
translation.es: Si se quejan por daños, paguen lo que pidan.

translation.en: -[Ilani] We'll need money. -I'll take care of it.
We're gonna need to watch him 24 hours a day. We'll do it in shifts.
translation.es: Habrá que vigilarlo por turnos las 24 horas.

translation.en: Now you need us in the room with him?
He could swallow his tongue, try to hang himself. We're not gonna let him get out of this. Understood?
translation.es: Puede tragarse la lengua, colgarse. No dejaremos que escape, ¿entendido?

translation.en: [Rafi] Aharoni's the only one who speaks to him.
translation.es: Aharoni será el único que le hablará.

translation.en: If you have something to say, keep it to yourself. Got it?
translation.es: Si tienen algo que decir, guárdenselo, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Moshe] And if they find us?
We're not just gonna let him go, are we?
-Quiet. He can hear everything. -[Peter] We have him.
translation.es: Más bajo. Puede oír todo. Lo tenemos.

translation.en: Now we just lay low, play the "who's the worst cook than Rafi?" game.
translation.es: Ahora seamos discretos. Juguemos a ver quién cocina peor que Rafi.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -[Peter] Hard part's over.
[Rafi] Germany issued an extradition request a few months back
translation.es: Alemania pidió la extradición hace unos meses,

translation.en: and they suspect he's hiding here, too.
[Harel] Okay. From now on, nobody leave this house.
translation.es: De ahora en más, nadie sale de la casa.

translation.en: -[Aharoni] That's right. We all sit tight. -[Hanna] A scared old blind man.
translation.es: - Aquí esperaremos. - Un viejo ciego y asustado.

translation.en: -It's our fault they got him. -[Peter] What are you doing here?
translation.es: - Lo arrestaron por nuestra culpa. - ¿Qué hacen aquí?

translation.en: The police arrested Lothar Hermann, claiming he's Joseph Mengele.
translation.es: La policía arrestó a Lothar Hermann, dicen que es Josef Mengele.

translation.en: -Joseph Mengele. -[Rafi] Yeah.
The angel of death himself.
-[Hanna] This is a bad joke. -This is Fuldner's people.
translation.es: - Parece una broma. - Fue la gente de Fuldner.

translation.en: They're using him as bait.
translation.es: - Lo están usando de carnada. - Hay algo peor.

translation.en: [Harel] It's worse than that. El Al is refusing to send a plane.
translation.es: - Lo están usando de carnada. - Hay algo peor. El Al se niega a enviar el avión. Primero quieren algo de nosotros.

translation.en: They say first they need something from us.
translation.es: El Al se niega a enviar el avión. Primero quieren algo de nosotros.

translation.en: A signed document from Eichmann saying he'll willingly come to Israel.
translation.es: Un documento firmado por Eichmann que diga que irá voluntariamente a Israel.

translation.en: [Peter] What?
-They're out of their minds. -Enough!
Can't we have Dani fake it?
No, we have no idea what his signature looks like.
translation.es: No, no tenemos idea de cómo es su firma.

translation.en: Can you squeeze a signature out of him?
Can you?
Of course, yeah.
Well, he's going to need to read it. Did you replace the glasses that you lost?
translation.es: Necesitará leerla. ¿Reemplazaron los lentes que perdieron?

translation.en: Thank you. For these.
[Eichmann] I'm grateful.
You want me to stand trial in place of an entire regime?
translation.es: ¿Quieren juzgarme en representación de todo un régimen?

translation.en: I'm offering you a fair trial.
If these are German crimes, they should be tried in German courts.
translation.es: Si son crímenes alemanes, deberían juzgarse en cortes alemanas.

translation.en: -That's not an option. -Ask your superiors to negotiate.
translation.es: - No es una opción. - Pida a sus superiores que negocien.

translation.en: If they refuse, I do, too.
translation.es: Si ellos se niegan, yo también.

translation.en: I've no desire to be your scapegoat.
translation.es: No quiero ser su chivo expiatorio.

translation.en: I'd argue the Architect of the Final Solution has plenty to answer for.
translation.es: Yo diría que el arquitecto de la Solución Final tiene mucho que responder.

translation.en: The Architect... of the Final Solution.
-Do you deny your title? -We love nicknames.
translation.es: ¿Niega su título? Nos encantan los apodos.

translation.en: They used to call me the Little Jew.
Did you know that?
I read about Nuremberg.
Those swine, Wisliceny and Höttl.
Blaming the absent to escape the noose.
translation.es: ...culparon a los ausentes para huir de la horca.

translation.en: Well, then refute them. Come to Israel.
Make your case to the world.
I would rather die...
than have my history told the way someone else would like it to have been.
translation.es: antes que contar mi historia como otro quisiera que haya sido.

translation.en: You have no interest in what I have to say,
translation.es: A ustedes no les interesa lo que vaya a decir,

translation.en: unless it confirms what you think you already know.
translation.es: a menos que confirme lo que creen que ya saben.

translation.en: [Aharoni] Tell me, what is it that I think I already know?
translation.es: Dígame, ¿qué es lo que creo que ya sé?

translation.en: The...
-May I have a cigarette? -You may not.
[Eichmann] The exact consequences of my work were kept hidden from me.
translation.es: Las consecuencias exactas de mi trabajo me fueron ocultadas.

translation.en: I was merely a cog in a machine...
translation.es: Yo era un mero engranaje en una máquina...

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -...digging its way to hell.
translation.es: ...que se abría camino hacia el infierno.

translation.en: By the end, I was chained to my desk.
translation.es: Hacia el final, estaba encadenado a mi escritorio.

translation.en: Twenty hours a day.
My job was simple.
Save the country I love from being destroyed.
translation.es: Evitar que destruyeran el país que amaba.

translation.en: Is your job any different?
But none of what I say matters. Your lawyers and your lying press
translation.es: Pero nada de lo que diga importa. Sus abogados y su prensa mentirosa

translation.en: will try the man they think they know, not the one who sits before you now.
translation.es: juzgarán al hombre que creen conocer y no al que está frente a ellos.

translation.en: [Rafi] Forty, sixty, eighty, five hundred.
Okay.
Graciela?
[Rafi] Uh, groceries.
[Aharoni] Can someone else feed him?
-[Moshe] It's your turn. -[Aharoni] I know.
translation.es: - Es tu turno. - Ya lo sé.

translation.en: I'm... I'm asking for a favor.
[Peter] All done.
You're the man who grabbed me. I know your voice.
translation.es: Usted fue el que me atrapó. Reconozco su voz.

translation.en: Yes.
Please, just tell me. My family, are they safe?
translation.es: Por favor, solo dígame si mi familia está a salvo.

translation.en: [Klaus] You said you had news.
Do you know the number of people buried here because they wouldn't listen?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántas personas hay enterradas aquí por no escuchar?

translation.en: Everyone should visit this place once in a while
translation.es: Todos deberían venir aquí de vez en cuando

translation.en: to remember things can go the wrong way if you don't behave the proper way.
translation.es: para recordar que las cosas pueden salir mal si no se comportan como deben.

translation.en: Two Jews returned a rented Buick to a shop near Acassuso.
translation.es: Dos judíos devolvieron un Buick alquilado cerca de Acassuso.

translation.en: [Carlos] They paid for it in US dollars,
but the vendor called the police
translation.es: Pero el vendedor llamó a la policía

translation.en: when he saw the license plate had been tampered with.
translation.es: cuando notó que habían adulterado la matrícula.

translation.en: -And the rental documents? -We don't know.
translation.es: - ¿Y el contrato de alquiler? - No sabemos.

translation.en: Their identification was forged.
We'll talk to shopkeepers.
If so much as an empanada is paid for in dollars, I want us to know.
translation.es: Si pagan siquiera una empanada con dólares, quiero saberlo.

translation.en: [Peter] It's too tight.
[Ilani] Don't any of them come with some actual shape to them?
-Is there any medium? Okay. -[Harel] We are running out of time.
translation.es: - ¿Algún talle medio? - Se nos acaba el tiempo.

translation.en: [Harel] We have to get the signature.
[Aharoni] He's being belligerent.
The problem is he's got no incentive to sign it.
translation.es: No tiene un incentivo para firmar.

translation.en: If the easy way doesn't work, do it the hard way.
translation.es: Si no lo logras por las buenas, hazlo por las malas.

translation.en: You have my permission.
This guy convinced rabbis to load the trains themselves.
translation.es: Este sujeto convenció a rabinos de que ellos cargaran los trenes.

translation.en: [Peter] And not by force.
You can't strong arm a guy like that,
translation.es: No puedes usar la fuerza con alguien así.

translation.en: but if we can relate to him, if you appeal to his--
translation.es: Pero, si nos relacionamos con él, si apelas a su...

translation.en: Humanity?
His ego makes him feel like he's in control.
translation.es: ...a su ego, sentirá que él tiene el control.

translation.en: I appreciate you're trying to help, but he's as slippery as they come.
translation.es: Agradezco la ayuda, pero es de lo más escurridizo.

translation.en: Spots tricks a mile away. This only works if we wear him down.
translation.es: Se daría cuenta enseguida. Esto solo funcionará si lo cansamos.

translation.en: If he knows there's no escape, eventually he'll yield.
translation.es: Si sabe que no hay escapatoria, cederá.

translation.en: -That's not working. -You've done your job.
translation.es: - Pero no está funcionando. - Ya hiciste tu parte.

translation.en: Will you leave me to do mine?
[Eichmann] Let's put the shoe on your foot, shall we?
You're a soldier ordered to make me sign this,
translation.es: Usted es un soldado y le ordenaron hacerme firmar esto,

translation.en: but are you or your superiors responsible for that order?
translation.es: pero ¿son usted o sus superiores responsables de esa orden?

translation.en: I'm offering you a fair trial.
[Eichmann] Herr Captor, I need the lavatory, please.
translation.es: Herr secuestrador, necesito un baño, por favor.

translation.en: It's quite serious.
This would be much easier if I had something to read.
translation.es: Sería mucho más fácil si tuviera algo para leer.

translation.en: Should we lend him your copy of Mein Kampf or mine?
translation.es: ¿Le damos tu copia de Mi lucha o la mía?

translation.en: I remember visiting my father at the Tramway and Electrical. I was nine.
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando visité a mi padre en la compañía de tranvías a los nueve.

translation.en: He introduces me so proudly.
"My boy!" He says, "This is my boy!"
So, imagine my dismay when I had to use the bathroom and unleash sheer hell.
translation.es: Imaginen mi vergüenza cuando tuve que usar el baño y desaté un verdadero infierno.

translation.en: I said, "Everybody does it, Papa. Everybody shits."
translation.es: Le dije: "Todos lo hacen, papá. Todo el mundo hace caca".

translation.en: I think about that still, to this day.
translation.es: Sigo pensando en eso hasta el día de hoy.

translation.en: If only you'd cover my nose as well as my eyes.
translation.es: Deberían cubrirme la nariz además de los ojos.

translation.en: [Yaakov] So, this is the master race.
Oh, we used to say to be the perfect Nazi,
translation.es: Solíamos decir que el nazi perfecto debía ser

translation.en: you had to be as slim as Goering, as tall as Goebbels, and as blond as Hitler!
translation.es: delgado como Göring, alto como Goebbels y rubio como Hitler.

translation.en: May I wipe now, Herr Captor?
[Eichmann] My family, are they safe, please?
translation.es: Por favor, ¿mi familia está a salvo?

translation.en: -Of course, they are. -[gasps]
-What do you think of us? -Thank you. [clears throat] Thank you.
Herr Captor.
I wonder if I might keep speaking with you.
translation.es: Me pregunto si podría seguir hablando con usted.

translation.en: That Jobnik they send, he won't listen.
translation.es: Ese jobnik que enviaron no escucha.

translation.en: Round face, straight brown hair. Heavy set.
translation.es: Cara redonda, cabello lacio y castaño. Corpulento.

translation.en: I want eyes at all major transit points.
translation.es: Vigilen los principales puntos de transporte.

translation.en: This is one of the Jews who took Ricardo Klement.
translation.es: Este es uno de los judíos que secuestró a Ricardo Klement.

translation.en: -[Moshe] Do you want some more? -[Hanna] No, thank you.
[Yaakov] Oh, great, beef again.
I'd kill for a fish.
[Rafi] Shut up and eat your cubed cheese.
Why is it so bland?
-[Aharoni] It's missing the bacteria. -Or a nice goat's cheese.
translation.es: Le faltan bacterias. - O un rico queso de cabra. - ¿Conocen el queso lifta?

translation.en: [Rafi] You know that Lifta cheese back home?
translation.es: - O un rico queso de cabra. - ¿Conocen el queso lifta?

translation.en: It's really strong.
[chuckling You remember when Miriam made a cheesecake with it by accident
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando Miriam se equivocó y hizo un pastel con ese queso...

translation.en: and you ate a whole slice just to make her happy.
translation.es: ...y tú te comiste toda una porción para complacerla?

translation.en: [laughing] "No, Mir, this is really good. Thank you."
You know, Lifta is an Arab cheese.
translation.es: - ¿Sabías que el lifta es un queso árabe? - ¿Sí?

translation.en: Is it? I didn't, uh,
translation.es: - ¿Sabías que el lifta es un queso árabe? - ¿Sí? No le pedí documentos.

translation.en: -ask to see its papers. -Oh, this is a joke, right?
translation.es: No le pedí documentos. Es una broma, ¿no?

translation.en: [Moshe] Giving money to our enemies.
translation.es: Le das dinero a nuestros enemigos.

translation.en: The people who want us dead. It's hilarious. Aharoni, you tried that one yet?
translation.es: A quienes nos quieren matar. Qué gracioso. Aharoni, ¿probaste con eso?

translation.en: -See if it works on Eichmann. -He'll sign. We're close.
translation.es: - Ve si funciona con Eichmann. - Firmará. Estamos cerca.

translation.en: We should string him up and beat a signature out of him.
[Moshe] That's what they'd do to us, but no, that'd be too easy.
translation.es: Eso nos hacen a nosotros, pero no, sería muy fácil.

translation.en: Instead we have to feed him.
Relax, Moshe. It's just cheese.
translation.es: Tranquilo, Moshe. Es queso nada más.

translation.en: [Ilani] Moshe.
You're up next.
No, it's all right.
[Peter] I'll take his shift.
Why won't you sign?
I'm an Argentine citizen accused of crimes committed in Germany.
translation.es: Soy un ciudadano argentino acusado de crímenes cometidos en Alemania.

translation.en: Don't be modest.
Lithuania, Hungary, Poland. You were quite the traveler.
I should be tried in one of those countries.
translation.es: Deberían juzgarme en uno de esos países.

translation.en: Nah.
I don't buy it.
You can't win a war if soldiers don't follow their orders.
translation.es: No puede ganar una guerra si los soldados no obedecen órdenes.

translation.en: No, that's not good enough.
-The truth will out. -What is truth? Whose truth?
translation.es: - Se sabrá la verdad. - ¿Qué verdad? ¿La de quién?

translation.en: -No one will listen to me. -I wanna listen.
translation.es: Nadie me escuchará. Yo quiero escucharlo.

translation.en: Be treated like a dog. A show trial.
translation.es: Me tratarán como a un perro. Un juicio amañado.

translation.en: To pin everything on me. We held those, too, you know.
translation.es: Me culparán de todo. Nosotros también lo hicimos.

translation.en: The preening prosecutors, the compliant judges.
[inhales] My God. This--
[inhales] That's--
You look like shit.
Don't worry. I'm not gonna hurt you.
translation.es: No se preocupe, no lo lastimaré.

translation.en: Some of your men want to. I can smell it when they're in the room.
translation.es: Algunos de sus hombres quieren hacerlo. Lo huelo cuando vienen.

translation.en: -May I ask you something? -I'm not in a position to refuse.
translation.es: - ¿Puedo preguntarle algo? - No estoy en posición de negarme.

translation.en: Is it true you called the camps "liquidation machines"?
translation.es: ¿Es cierto que llamó a los campos "máquinas de liquidación"?

translation.en: Mengele called you all kosher salami.
Everyone used flippant terms for dirty work.
translation.es: Todos usaban términos displicentes para el trabajo sucio.

translation.en: -To make us seem like animals. -We're all animals.
translation.es: Para que pareciéramos animales. Todos somos animales.

translation.en: Fighting for scraps on the Serengeti.
Some of us just have bigger teeth than others.
translation.es: Solo que algunos tenemos dientes más grandes.

translation.en: You know I tried to help.
For years, I got your people out of the country.
translation.es: Durante años, saqué a los suyos del país.

translation.en: That was my solution. I wanted the Jews sent to Madagascar.
translation.es: Esa era mi solución, que enviaran a los judíos a Madagascar.

translation.en: Yes, dying of malaria is nicer than poisoned gas. Very thoughtful of you.
translation.es: Sí, mejor morir de malaria que con gas venenoso. Qué considerado.

translation.en: Other countries wouldn't take you.
translation.es: No los aceptaban en otros países.

translation.en: But that didn't stop me from trying. I negotiated.
translation.es: Pero, aun así, lo intenté. Negocié.

translation.en: With your Dr. Kasztner in Hungary.
translation.es: Con su doctor Kasztner en Hungría.

translation.en: Trucks for lives.
We tried to save Jewish lives.
He was a hero,
translation.es: Él fue un héroe, pero los judíos lo mataron a sangre fría.

translation.en: yet your people shot him in cold blood. Imagine what they'd do to me.
translation.es: Él fue un héroe, pero los judíos lo mataron a sangre fría. ¿Qué me harían a mí?

translation.en: -[Peter] I didn't know about that. -Hmm.
That's why you're here, Herr Captor.
translation.es: Por eso está aquí, herr secuestrador.

translation.en: To make me think Israel will listen to me.
translation.es: Para hacerme creer que Israel me escuchará.

translation.en: I just always fancied myself a barber.
Your razor.
The brand?
It's a lot older than you, I think.
translation.es: Es más vieja que usted, creo.

translation.en: From Solingen, like me.
My Papa died in Israel.
One of those pesky Jews who survived.
translation.es: Es uno de esos judíos molestos que sobrevivió.

translation.en: So, you didn't lose anyone.
I'm glad.
I don't know what I'd have become if my family had...
translation.es: No sé en qué me habría convertido si mi familia hubiera...

translation.en: [Peter] I spoke to him.
[Hanna] Why?
I was trying to get him to sign.
-Curious. -What did he say to you?
He said we're all animals.
The Jews?
No, no, everybody. Jews, Germans. All animals.
translation.es: - ¿Los judíos? - No, todos. Judíos, alemanes. Todos somos animales.

translation.en: Bullshit.
If we're animals, he would be in pieces now.
translation.es: Si fuera así, ya lo habríamos destrozado.

translation.en: -He says he was following orders. -He chose to do it.
translation.es: - Dice que seguía órdenes. - Él eligió eso.

translation.en: And we are choosing to keep him alive.
translation.es: Y nosotros elegimos mantenerlo con vida.

translation.en: To let him speak, but not here, not now.
translation.es: Dejarlo hablar. Pero no aquí, no ahora.

translation.en: Keep your distance.
-[music playing] -[Peter] Eleven...
twelve...
thirteen.
The boys love this.
translation.es: A los niños les encanta esto.

translation.en: -Fourteen -I prefer the older stuff.
-Carlito Gardel. -Fifteen.
-El Zorzal Criollo. -Sixteen.
-Seventeen. -[pants] Enough.
-Enough? -Enough.
[pants] Tell me about you,
Herr Captor.
I want to know what it was that brought our lives together like this.
translation.es: Quiero saber qué cruzó nuestras vidas así.

translation.en: How about this? You sign, I'll tell you anything you want to know.
translation.es: Si firma, le diré todo lo que quiera saber.

translation.en: Ah-ha. You're striking a deal.
I'm establishing a trading post.
But I'm fresh out of trucks before you ask.
translation.es: Pero no me quedan camiones, antes de que pregunte.

translation.en: It is... ha!
It is poor form to negotiate from a position of weakness.
translation.es: No es justo negociar desde una posición de debilidad.

translation.en: There's an art to these things.
Always know the man who sits across the bargaining table.
translation.es: Uno debe conocer al hombre del otro lado de la mesa.

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.
You sign, I'll tell you anything you wanna know.
translation.es: Si firma, le diré todo lo que quiera saber.

translation.en: I would like to offer a counter.
Your name in return for my consideration of your terms.
translation.es: Su nombre a cambio de que yo considere sus términos.

translation.en: Just your name.
Is that asking so much?
-Dani. -[coughs]
[Harel] We are running out of time.
translation.es: Se acaba el tiempo. 19 DE MAYO DE1960

translation.en: [Harel] I'll see you in an hour.
I am so close, sir. He's going to break. I know he's going to break.
translation.es: Estoy muy cerca, señor. Cederá. - Estoy seguro. - La policía vigila el barrio.

translation.en: [Rafi] We're hearing Nazis are searching the neighborhood.
translation.es: - Estoy seguro. - La policía vigila el barrio.

translation.en: I recommend we move Eichmann to another safe house.
translation.es: Recomiendo trasladar a Eichmann a otro lugar.

translation.en: [Harel] We can't move him. It's too risky.
Forget the damn paper. Forget him signing. Let's just get him out.
translation.es: Olviden el documento y la firma, llévenselo.

translation.en: It's more complicated that, Yaakov. El Al is the only way out.
translation.es: Es más complicado que eso. El Al es la única salida.

translation.en: -What do you mean it's more complicated-- -Yaakov. Let's just relax, okay?
[Eichmann] Look at me.
I do want the world to know what really happened.
translation.es: Quiero que el mundo sepa qué pasó realmente.

translation.en: But it needs to be fair.
People have to listen.
In Israel, they'll just want to see me suffer.
translation.es: En Israel, solo quieren verme sufrir.

translation.en: [Peter] No, not if they see you the way I've seen you.
translation.es: No, no si lo ven como yo lo vi.

translation.en: Talk to them the way you talk to me.
translation.es: Hábleles como me habla a mí.

translation.en: You can tell your story, the real one.
translation.es: Puede contar su historia, la verdadera.

translation.en: In a country where my family cannot even come to watch me die.
translation.es: En un país donde mi familia ni siquiera podrá ir a verme morir.

translation.en: No, I would rather end it all.
Right now.
Please, just ask your superiors...
translation.es: Por favor, pregúntele a sus superiores...

translation.en: for my family's sake. Please.
translation.es: ...por el bien de mi familia. Por favor.

translation.en: Dani's ready for him.
Hey, you're making everyone very nervous. Talk a walk just round the block, okay?
translation.es: Estás poniendo nerviosos a todos. Ve a dar una vuelta, ¿sí?

translation.en: Hide him, quickly!
[Rafi] Go, go, go.
-Anything? -[man] No.
Peter, help!
-No wonder he hasn't broken. -[Peter] All he knows is my name.
translation.es: - Con razón no cedió. - Solo sabe mi nombre.

translation.en: I've just spoken to him. Is it true you give him cigarettes?
translation.es: Hablé con él. ¿Es cierto que le diste cigarrillos?

translation.en: [Peter] Yeah.
[laughs] Oh, of course, he wouldn't break.
translation.es: Claro que no iba a ceder.

translation.en: He's getting room service here, catering to his every whim.
translation.es: Aquí tiene servicio a la habitación para satisfacer sus caprichos.

translation.en: Did you think for even a second what was going to happen, huh?
We're all going to rot in a cell because of you.
translation.es: Nos vamos a pudrir en una celda por tu culpa.

translation.en: -I can get the signature. -Give me a break.
-That's bullshit! -[Hanna] Let him.
-Let him try. -[Aharoni] Bullshit.
Let him try.
[Aharoni] That's nonsense. He's compromised us all again.
translation.es: Qué tontería, nos comprometió a todos de nuevo.

translation.en: Sir, I can do it.
We've got no choice.
[Harel] Get us his signature.
-I think you should sign. -Why?
Because I believe you.
Tell them what you told me, about the orders you ignored.
translation.es: Dígales lo que me dijo, lo de las órdenes que no obedeció.

translation.en: They'll only hear the ones I took.
You and I both know I shall die in Israel.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que moriré en Israel.

translation.en: Don't lie to me, Peter.
Why am I the one guilty for my country's mistakes?
translation.es: ¿Por qué soy culpable de los errores de mi país?

translation.en: So, you would say what you did to my people was a mistake?
translation.es: ¿Dice que lo que le hizo a mi pueblo fue un error?

translation.en: We were told that Germany,
our land of hope and possibility, was being overrun.
translation.es: nuestra tierra de la esperanza, tenía una invasión.

translation.en: -If we were to survive-- -Yes, but there's a line.
translation.es: - Para sobrevivir... - Sí, pero hay un límite.

translation.en: And you believe you people have found that line, do you? Funny.
translation.es: ¿Y ustedes creen que lo encontraron? Qué curioso.

translation.en: I've heard the rumors, a facility in the Negev Desert.
translation.es: Oí los rumores. Un centro en el desierto del Néguev.

translation.en: Do you know a hydrogen bomb rarely asks the age of his victims?
translation.es: Una bomba de hidrógeno no le pregunta la edad a sus víctimas.

translation.en: That's not the same and you know it.
translation.es: No es lo mismo y lo sabe.

translation.en: You watch, they'll cremate my body.
I don't know. I don't know what they'll do in Israel.
translation.es: No sé que harán en Israel.

translation.en: And not everyone will give you the chance to say your peace.
translation.es: Y no todos le darán la oportunidad de hablar.

translation.en: Whom did we take from you, Peter?
Think about your boys.
If you sign, they'll know you told the truth.
translation.es: Si firma, sabrán que dijo la verdad...

translation.en: That you went to Israel with nothing to hide.
translation.es: ...que fue a Israel sin nada que ocultar.

translation.en: Whom did you lose?
-We lost six million-- -I'm asking about you.
translation.es: - Perdimos seis millones... - Hablo de usted.

translation.en: She's beautiful.
She was more than my sister.
She was my teacher,
and parent.
My friend.
She had three beautiful children.
May I ask how she died?
We think... in the woods near Lublin.
translation.es: Creemos que en el bosque cerca de Lublin.

translation.en: -I'm afraid I don't-- -I wasn't asking.
translation.es: - Me temo que... - No era una pregunta.

translation.en: Of course.
She would have died...
protecting the little ones. I know that much.
I'm sorry.
I am truly sorry.
May I...
May I ask her name?
-Fruma. -[whispers] Fruma.
Her name was Fruma.
I saw you... watching the trains.
You were counting the wagons with your boy.
translation.es: Contaba los vagones con su hijo.

translation.en: Just like Fruma used to do with her little boy.
translation.es: Como solía hacer Fruma con su pequeño.

translation.en: The only difference...
is that her boy is dead, and yours is alive.
translation.es: es que el hijo de ella está muerto y el suyo está vivo.

translation.en: Are you a family man, Peter?
Maybe one day.
It only gets harder with age. Trust me.
translation.es: Se hace más difícil con la edad. Créame.

translation.en: You have a woman, I'd assume, so why no children?
translation.es: Asumo que tiene una esposa, ¿por qué no tiene hijos?

translation.en: I think you know why.
I think perhaps you worry that the future will look like the past.
translation.es: Quizá tema que el futuro se parezca al pasado.

translation.en: I hope that changes... for your sake.
translation.es: Espero que eso cambie por su bien.

translation.en: I would like to ask one last thing.
I would like to see my wife again one last time before I die.
translation.es: Quisiera ver a mi esposa por última vez antes de morir.

translation.en: If you sign, I'll make sure you see your wife again.
translation.es: Si firma, me aseguraré de que vuelva a verla.

translation.en: You swear it, Peter?
On Fruma?
On Fruma.
You did it. [laughs]
[Carlos] We know you work for the Jews.
translation.es: Sabemos que trabajas para los judíos.

translation.en: If you want us to stop, you must tell me where he is, my dear.
translation.es: Si quieres que paremos, dime dónde está, querida.

translation.en: [crying] I don't know. I don't know.
-[shouting] Stop! Stop! Stop! -[screams]
[Klaus] Stop!
My name is Klaus Eichmann.
I just want my father back.
translation.es: Solo quiero encontrar a mi padre.

translation.en: Please.
Help.
Help me and I can make them stop.
[Rafi ] Let's clear the house of all personal items.
translation.es: No dejen nada personal en la casa.

translation.en: Moshe, prep the cars.
-Yaakov, get the luggage ready. -[Yaakov] Okay.
-Oh, where's Graciela? Someone call her. -[Ilani] I'm on it, boss.
translation.es: ¿Dónde está Graciela? Llámenla. Yo lo haré.

translation.en: [Rafi] Go get Eichmann ready. We leave in one hour. Let's go.
translation.es: Preparen a Eichmann. Nos vamos en una hora. Vamos.

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah. -[Eichmann] Time to go, is it?
I'll examine you and then I'll give you a shot to relax.
translation.es: Lo examinaré y le daré una inyección para que se relaje.

translation.en: Understood?
Sounds very peaceful.
[Hanna] Sit back.
You remind me of her.
His Fruma.
[Eichmann] I said I couldn't help, but perhaps I can.
translation.es: Dije que no podía ayudar, pero tal vez pueda.

translation.en: Her story, your story,
translation.es: La historia de ella, su historia...

translation.en: reminds me of when I was sent east.
translation.es: ...me recuerda a cuando me enviaron al Este.

translation.en: General Müller asked I check on the Einsatzgruppen,
translation.es: El general Müller me pidió que visitara a los Einsatzgruppen. Estaban desanimados.

translation.en: the morale had dropped. They needed an authority figure...
translation.es: El general Müller me pidió que visitara a los Einsatzgruppen. Estaban desanimados. Necesitaban una figura de autoridad para revitalizarlos.

translation.en: to reinvigorate them.
translation.es: Necesitaban una figura de autoridad para revitalizarlos.

translation.en: And, to my mind... [clears throat]
I wondered if I might solve the issue.
translation.es: ...me preguntaba si yo podría resolver el problema.

translation.en: Find a less chaotic manner
translation.es: Encontrar una forma menos caótica de proceder

translation.en: of proceeding other than vans and bullets.
translation.es: Encontrar una forma menos caótica de proceder sin camionetas ni balas.

translation.en: It was horrifying.
Five thousand Jews lined up to stand in this pit.
translation.es: Cinco mil judíos en fila de pie en una fosa.

translation.en: I had to drink Schnapps to keep from fainting.
translation.es: Tuve que beber aguardiente para no desmayarme.

translation.en: I remember a woman and her baby.
translation.es: Recuerdo a una mujer y a su bebé.

translation.en: She begged for the child's life.
translation.es: Ella rogaba por la vida del niño.

translation.en: She lifted it up
as if she might give her baby to me, as if I might save it.
translation.es: como para entregarme al niño, como si yo fuera a salvarlo.

translation.en: I would, on occasion,
do such things, an old acquaintance,
translation.es: yo ayudaba a algún viejo conocido,

translation.en: people who might be of use, but this--
translation.es: a personas que podrían ser útiles, pero esto...

translation.en: [Hanna] Stop talking, please.
Then bang.
[Eichmann] The bullet that killed her goes straight through her child first.
translation.es: La bala que la mató atravesó al niño primero.

translation.en: I remember wiping its brains off my jacket.
translation.es: Recuerdo que me limpié los sesos del abrigo.

translation.en: Do you think that's how we did it, Peter?
[Eichmann] Do you think that's how we killed Fruma?
[Eichmann] One can hope it was that quick.
translation.es: Esperemos que haya sido así de rápido,

translation.en: That they didn't do the things some soldiers do,
translation.es: que no hayan hecho lo que hacían algunos soldados,

translation.en: but then we'll never know.
[Hanna] Peter, don't listen to him.
[Eichmann] They'll say my death is justice
translation.es: Dirán que mi muerte es justicia

translation.en: for all the people you lost.
translation.es: por todas las personas que perdieron.

translation.en: That makes my life worth six million Frumas.
translation.es: Eso hace que mi vida valga seis millones de Frumas.

translation.en: How does that make you feel, knowing that she's not worth the spit in my mouth?
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo hace sentir que ella no valga ni la saliva de mi boca?

translation.en: -Let go of the syringe. Peter! -Do it, for God's sake.
Go on, do it you coward. -Leave. -[Hanna] Don't.
translation.es: - Hazlo, cobarde. - Sal de la habitación.

translation.en: -Make her worth something! -[Peter] Get out.
-[Hanna] Peter. -Leave.
-Is that what you want? -[shouts] Leave right now!
Come on. Do it!
[Hanna] Rafi!
[Hanna] Get him out. He's ready.
[Rafi] Leave the cars. Out the back.
[Rafi] Moshe, do your thing.
-[Moshe] Yep. -[Peter] I got him.
[Peter] Go around.
[Moshe] Come on. Come on.
[Peter] The car's too small, we're not gonna fit.
translation.es: El auto es muy pequeño, no entraremos.

translation.en: [Moshe] Go get in the other car.
-[Peter[ What about you? -[Rafi] There's no room. I'm staying.
translation.es: ¿Y tú? No hay lugar. Me quedaré.

translation.en: [Rafi] I'll find my own way home. Tell me what it was like.
translation.es: Encontraré la forma de volver. Luego me cuentas.

translation.en: -I should have-- -[Aharoni] No, no. It's all right.
You got what we needed.
I just thought...
I just need him to be there.
I know, me too.
Our slot is in 15 minutes.
You'd better hope your people hurry up.
translation.es: Mejor que su gente se apure.

translation.en: Don't worry.
[Moshe] Take him up. I'll get rid of the car.
translation.es: Súbanlo, yo me deshago del auto.

translation.en: [traffic controller] You are clear for landing, 25 right.
Winds are two, three, four, and six.
translation.es: vientos dos, tres, cuatro y seis.

translation.en: [controller] Three, five, five, eight, five, five. This is Buenos Aires.
translation.es: Tres, cinco, cinco, ocho, cinco, cinco. Buenos Aires.

translation.en: -[pilot over radio] -[controller] We have you on radar.
Quickly, strap him in.
Air traffic control. This is El Al 4XAGD. NOTAMS checked.
translation.es: Control Aéreo, habla el El Al 4XAGD. NOTAM recibido.

translation.en: Our flight path confirmed. Ready for takeoff.
translation.es: Ruta aérea confirmada. Listos para el despegue.

translation.en: [controller] El Al, slot for you in five. Confirming landing permits now.
translation.es: El Al, despegue en cinco. Confirmando permisos de aterrizaje.

translation.en: Can I speak to you for a moment?
I'm sorry.
I lost it over there.
-No. It's just about you. -You know that I love you.
translation.es: - No. - Sabes que te amo. Todo se trata de ti.

translation.en: Your pain.
Your hate.
-It's a long trip. In the air we'll talk. -Okay.
translation.es: Es un viaje largo. Hablaremos en el vuelo. Bueno.

translation.en: [Peter] What's going on?
-[co-pilot] We have a problem. -[Harel] What?
We have to stop, and I've got to refuel.
translation.es: Debemos hacer escala en Dakar para reabastecernos.
