translation.en: We filed a landing permit this morning but they're saying they don't have it.
translation.es: Entregamos el permiso de aterrizaje, pero dicen que no está.

translation.en: That's impossible.
[Aharoni] It can't be an accident. What do you want to do?
They're sending someone to collect our copy.
translation.es: Enviarán a alguien a buscar una copia.

translation.en: -How long's that gonna take? -Fifteen minutes. Thirty maybe.
translation.es: - ¿Eso cuánto tomará? - Quince minutos. Tal vez media hora.

translation.en: What if one of us ran it over, would we be able to get back in time?
translation.es: Si alguien de aquí lo llevara, ¿saldríamos a tiempo?

translation.en: [Harel] Can someone from your crew go?
[pilot] I am not leaving any of my crew behind.
translation.es: No abandonaré a nadie de mi equipo.

translation.en: I'll go.
Give me the permit.
-Landing permits. El Al. Who do I...? -[controller]Traffic at three o'clock.
Okay. They can go now.
Immediately, or the next slot's in 15 minutes.
-Fifteen minutes. -That gives you time to re-board.
Do it. Send the plane now.
[pilot] Ladies and gentlemen, we have been cleared to take off.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, estamos listos para el despegue.

translation.en: What about Peter?
[Klaus shouts] Let go! Let go! My father is on that plane!
[Klaus] Let go!
[Klaus shouts] Let go!
[Ben-Gurion] Ladies and gentlemen of the Knesset,
a short time ago, the most notorious Nazi war criminal,
translation.es: ...hace poco, el más infame criminal de guerra nazi,

translation.en: Adolf Eichmann, responsible with the Nazi leaders
translation.es: Adolf Eichmann, responsable junto a los líderes nazis

translation.en: for the extermination of six million of the Jews of Europe,
translation.es: del exterminio de seis millones de judíos europeos,

translation.en: has been discovered and apprehended.
[Ben Gurion] Adolf Eichmann is already under arrest in Israel.
translation.es: Adolf Eichmann ya se encuentra detenido en Israel.

translation.en: He will shortly be placed on trial in Jerusalem
translation.es: En breve, será sometido a juicio en Jerusalén

translation.en: under the terms of the law for the trial of Nazis and their helpers.
translation.es: de acuerdo a la Ley de Enjuiciamiento de los Nazis y sus Colaboradores.

translation.en: [Peter] All fixed.
[Mrs. Malkin] Take her with you.
[officer] Ticket.
Identification. Very nice.
Join the back of the line.
translation.es: Vaya al final de la fila.

translation.en: -[officer] Tickets. -[Aharoni] Peter.
[Peter] It's quite a line. [Aharoni] It's all right. I'll help you get in.
translation.es: - La fila es larga. - No te preocupes, te haré entrar.

translation.en: [man] I stand here before you, judges of Israel,
translation.es: Me encuentro hoy frente a ustedes, jueces de Israel,

translation.en: to lead the prosecution of Adolf Eichmann,
translation.es: para liderar la acusación contra Adolf Eichmann.

translation.en: but I am not standing alone.
With me are six million accusers.
translation.es: Me acompañan seis millones de demandantes.

translation.en: But they cannot rise to their feet, and point toward him who sits in the dock
translation.es: Pero ellos no pueden ponerse de pie y señalar hacia el banquillo

translation.en: and cry out, j'accuse!
[man] For their ashes
are piled up on the hills of Auschwitz and in the fields of Treblinka.
translation.es: ...están amontonadas en las colinas de Auschwitz y en los campos de Treblinka.

translation.en: Their blood cries out,
but their voice is not heard.
[man] Therefore, today I will be their spokesman.
And in their name, I will unfold the awesome indictment.
translation.es: Y, en nombre de ellos, levantaré esta terrible acta de acusación.

translation.en: The history of the Jewish people is steeped in suffering and tears.
translation.es: La historia del pueblo judío está empapada de sufrimiento y lágrimas.

translation.en: Yet never, down the entire blood-stained road traveled by this people,
translation.es: Y, aun así, en todo el camino manchado de sangre que atravesaron...

translation.en: [Rafi] Hey.
They say the only thing Eichmann will talk about
is what the cover of his autobiography's gonna look like.
translation.es: de cómo será la portada de su autobiografía.

translation.en: -You chosen yours yet? -[Rafi] No.
You think Miriam would let me make that decision? She barely lets me choose breakfast.
translation.es: ¿Crees que Miriam me dejaría decidir eso? Apenas me deja elegir el desayuno.

translation.en: You gonna go back in?
I don't know.
[Rafi] You don't have to.
Fruma won't hate you for letting go.
translation.es: Fruma no te odiará por seguir adelante.

translation.en: You got him. Remember that.
translation.es: Tú lo atrapaste, no lo olvides.

translation.en: -Yeah. It wasn't just me, Raf. -[Rafi] Ah.
translation.es: Sí. No fui yo solo, Raf.

translation.en: It doesn't matter anyway. No one's gonna know it was us.
translation.es: No importa. Nadie sabrá que fuimos nosotros.

translation.en: History only remembers the tall people.
translation.es: La historia solo recuerda a los altos.

translation.en: -What about Napoleon? -[Rafi] Who?
